definition: 100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]
to succeed/to finish/to complete/to accomplish/to become/to turn into/to be all right/OK!/one tenth
word/statement/speech/lyrics/CL:組|组[zu3],個|个[ge4]/a form of lyric poetry, flourishing in the Song dynasty 宋朝|宋朝[Song4 chao2]/CL:首[shou3]

pinyin: pian1 zheng4 shi4 he2 cheng2 ci2
lian2 he2 shi4 he2 cheng2 ci2

sentences.english: English has a lot of words which are made by composition and derivation.
sentences.chinese: 英語有大量的合成詞和派生詞。

sentences.english: The morpheme repeated prime paradigm was used to probe the mental representation of compound words.
sentences.chinese: 用詞素重複啓動的方法考察合成詞的心理表徵。

sentences.english: Is a compound word , made up of two words.
sentences.chinese: 元旦是一個合成詞，由兩個字組成。

sentences.english: Witkey is a synthesis of word, its literal translation is the key to open the wisdom.
sentences.chinese: 威客是一個合成詞，它的字面翻譯是開啓智慧的鑰匙。
讓我們來組成一個合成詞。
